title: Cicero Brutus 3 - we learn in lines 3-4

content.prompt: We learn from the words <u>homines</u> . . . <u>iucundi</u> (lines 3-4) that

choices.label: Cicero was often interrupted during his private conversations
Cicero hoped to settle his argument with Brutus and Atticus
Cicero, Brutus, and Atticus were all close friends
